content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with Under Arrest this week. We’ll hear The Case Of The Accidental Murders, from August 6, 1948.

(30:11) Our second story comes from Matthew Slade, Private Investigator. From September 27, 1964, we’ll hear A Sweet Scent Of Mystery.

Download CaseClosed699

Case Closed is made available for free thanks to your support. If you’re able to help, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you!
